name: Input
description: Reading player key inputs. Note that inputs are best handled in OnFrame rather than OnTick, due to being updated every frame and not every physics tick.

staticMethods.label: GetKeyName
staticMethods.description: Gets the key name the player assigned to the key setting.

staticMethods.label: GetKeyHold
staticMethods.description: Returns true if the key is being held down.

staticMethods.label: GetKeyDown
staticMethods.description: Returns true if the key was pressed down this frame.

staticMethods.label: GetKeyUp
staticMethods.description: Returns true if the key was released this frame.

staticMethods.label: GetMouseAim
staticMethods.description: Returns the position the player is aiming at.

staticMethods.label: GetCursorAimDirection
staticMethods.description: Returns the ray the player is aiming at.

staticMethods.label: GetMouseSpeed
staticMethods.description: Returns the speed of the mouse.

staticMethods.label: GetMousePosition
staticMethods.description: Returns the position of the mouse.

staticMethods.label: GetScreenDimensions
staticMethods.description: Returns the dimensions of the screen.

staticMethods.label: SetKeyDefaultEnabled
staticMethods.description: Sets whether the key is enabled by default.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the key should be enabled by default.

staticMethods.label: SetKeyHold
staticMethods.description: Sets whether the key is being held down.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the key should be held down.

staticMethods.label: SetCategoryKeysEnabled
staticMethods.description: Sets whether all keys in the specified category are enabled by default.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category name. Refer to InputCategoryEnum

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the keys should be enabled by default.

staticMethods.label: SetGeneralKeysEnabled
staticMethods.description: Sets whether all General category keys are enabled by default.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the keys should be enabled by default.

staticMethods.label: SetInteractionKeysEnabled
staticMethods.description: Sets whether all Interaction category keys are enabled by default.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the keys should be enabled by default.

staticMethods.label: SetTitanKeysEnabled
staticMethods.description: Sets whether all Titan category keys are enabled by default.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the keys should be enabled by default.

staticMethods.label: SetHumanKeysEnabled
staticMethods.description: Sets whether all Human category keys are enabled by default.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the keys should be enabled by default.
